name: diffstudio
description: Generador de la web de DIFF Estudio Creativo.

scripts.watch-sass: node-sass -w -r --source-map true src/sass/main.sass build/css/styles.css && browser-sync reload
scripts.watch-js: nodemon --watch ./src -e js -x "npm run compile-js && npm run replace && browser-sync reload"
scripts.watch-img: nodemon --watch ./src -e png gif svg jpg jpeg -x "npm run parse-img && browser-sync reload"
scripts.watch-html: nodemon --watch ./src -e html -x "npm run parse-html && npm run replace && browser-sync reload"
scripts.watch: npm run browser-sync & npm run watch-js & npm run watch-sass & npm run watch-img & npm run watch-html
scripts.build: clean run clean && npm run compile-js && npm run minify-js && npm run compile-sass && npm run minify-css && npm run minify-img && npm run minify-html && npm run replace

author: Andrés Bayón
